programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Patagonia: The Ends of the Earth

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Ethiopia: Land of Extremes

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Pantanal: Brazil's Wild Heart

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Taiga: The Frozen Forest

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: The Tundra: Desert of Ice

programme.title: World's Greatest: Coral Islands
programme.desc: The reef systems that gave rise to coral islands support the vast majority of marine species on our planet, but they are under threat. Explore the delicate balance between exploiting and preserving these extraordinary natural wonders.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Nearshore Islands
programme.desc: Some of the worldâ€™s greatest islands are so close that they blend in with the mainland. But regardless of their size and origins, they are often the islands we are drawn to the most, each forging their own unique identity.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Cruises
programme.desc: There is something seductive about setting sail. Cruises offer us a chance to dip our toes into the 70% of our planet awash with oceans, rivers, and lakes, exploring places that can only be reached by daring to leave the shore.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Forest Animals
programme.desc: Forest Animals gets up close with bears, koalas, moose, wolves, weaver ants, and Tasmanian Devils. This episode roves dark forests floors and soars above vast canopies of green in America, China, Laos, and Australia.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Deserts
programme.desc: For all their reputation as inhospitable places, deserts are full of incredible plants and animals that have adapted to the climate. They are bursting with geological wonders that inspire and are home to some of the most life in the world.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Makes Waves/It Came From Beyond
programme.desc: With the community pool closed for repairs and the temperature on the rise, Arthur and D.W. need a place to keep cool. Then, Grandma Thora takes in a stray: an adorable little dog named...Killer?

programme.title: Arthur: Ants in Arthur's Pants/Don't Ask Muffy
programme.desc: To excel in science, the class has to prove that they have P.A.N.T.S.--the ability to be patient, attentive, nosy, thoughtful, and systematic. And Muffy starts an advice column to launch her career as a rich and famous talk-show host.

programme.title: Arthur: Prunella Sees the Light/Return of the Snowball
programme.desc: For her sleepover with Marina, Prunella redecorates her room. But Marina is blind--will the decorations she can't see offend her, or worse, make her trip? D.W. has been trying to solve the mystery of her snowball's disappearance.

programme.title: Arthur: What's Cooking?/Buster's Special Delivery

programme.title: D.W. and the Beastly Birthday
programme.desc: Time to put on your party hats and dancing shoes â€“ D.W. is turning five! When her birthday doesnâ€™t go as planned, D.W. runs away to the magical island of Ukubonga. This is one party you donâ€™t want to miss!

programme.title: Arthur: Muffy's Classy Classics Club/Best Enemies
programme.desc: Muffy buys all of the books and dolls in the Pretty Pioneers series and invites her friends to join a pretty book club. Mom has new clients coming over and they have a daughter who is D.W.'s age. They're going to be the best of friends!

programme.title: Arthur: Just Desserts/The Big Dig

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Missing Mom

programme.desc: Angelica's been speaking to Jeroen online for three and a half years. After several failed attempts to meet, she's now desperate to find out if Jeroen is real? (S2, ep5)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Cole, Abbie & The Fanpage
programme.desc: Cole and Abbie keep being sent anonymous creepy gifts to their home and their relationship is now at breaking point. Julie and Oobah head to Scotland to try and help save their marriage. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Levi & Will
programme.desc: Levi is convinced Will is his dream man and broke up with his boyfriend so they could be together. After always cancelling on Levi, Oobah and Nella suspect something fishy is going on. (S2, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Emma & Harlin
programme.desc: Julie and Oobah uncover more than they were expecting, as their search to help Emma find her online love Harlin takes a sinister turn. (S1, ep1)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Alayah & Tommy
programme.desc: Alayah and Tommy started messaging on a live streaming platform. Alayah thinks he could be the one, but when they try and meet, he keeps cancelling. Nella and Oobah help to track him down. (S2, ep8)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Daddy's Little Girl
programme.desc: At 16 Mindy Berenyi, an Antwerp, Ohio girl claiming to be a victim of physical and psychological abuse, was tried for the murder of her father and, having agreed to a plea bargain, was sentenced to prison.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Killer Next Door
programme.desc: Donald Miller, was sentenced to 30 to 50 years for rape and attempted murder but was suspected in four other murders. In an unusual plea bargain, Miller agreed to work with police trying to recover his memories of other murders.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Pain and Gain
programme.desc: A report about the crimes of the Sun Gym gang, a group of Miami, Florida drifters, petty thieves, and bodybuilders who kidnapped and killed wealthy people to fuel their lifestyle.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Love, Hate & Obsession
programme.desc: In the investigation of the murder of a one-time millionaire, both his ex-wife and his son are suspects.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Black Dahlia Confidential
programme.desc: The brutal murder in 1947 of Elizabeth Short, a young, struggling actress whose body was discovered in a vacant lot in January 1947, has baffled the Los Angeles Police Department for decades

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: F.B.I. Agent Dale Cooper comes to the logging town of Twin Peaks to investigate the murder of Laura Palmer, a beautiful and popular high school student. While investigating, Agent Cooper slowly learns that strange things are happening.
